description.value:
You pull a large handful of guts from your midsection. Removing these guts doesn't harm you. You can use the guts as 50 feet of rope to help you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Climb]{Climb}, and they help attach you to a wall. You move half as quickly as usual while climbing with your guts (minimum 5 feet), but you can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check whenever you critically fail to prevent a fall. Other creatures can use your guts to climb like a squishy rope, but the guts don't help anyone but you attach to a wall. If you let go of your guts or your guts are damaged, the spell ends.

Heightened (3rd) You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using your guts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level)]{Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level)}
